verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Who are these, which are arrayed in white robes?
Who are these, and from where do they come?
These are they who came out, (2x)
These are they who come out of great tribulation.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
And they have washed their robes and made them white,
They have washed their robes and made them white (2x)
In the blood of the Lamb.
